Log module¶

Self-made logger which prints coloured info, warning, error, success and debug statements to terminal.

Log.debug(message, script='')¶
Log.error(message, script='')¶
Log.general(message, type, script)¶
Log.info(message, script='')¶
Log.success(message, script='')¶
Log.warning(message, script='')¶
